thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: Alice Mauck
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by Alice Mauck

author: Alice Mauck
title: Alice Mauck
text: I have had some questions during our time with Figo and each time I have been blown away by the quick, personal, kind and thoughtful response! The claims are settled in usually one day and the claims process is ridculously simple. Many, many companies could take lessons from Figo regarding how they do business and how they treat their customers. I honestly cannot say enough about this company! Top notch all the way!
